channel.title: Modify Watches: New Products - Independence Day Bundle
channel.description: A list of the new products at Modify Watches.

item.title: 4-Piece Camo Independence Day Set (with BucketFeet)
item.description:
We're partnering with our friends at BucketFeet on an Independence Day Bundle. Buy this 4-Piece Independence Day Set with the Camo face, red strap, white strap and blue strap with code BUCKETFEET and yo..

Price: $65.00
